alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 11 at 2:39PM MST until December 12 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 12 inches, except 6 to 16 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes. * WHERE...Lemhi Highlands, Centennial Mountains, and Island Park region. * WHEN...Until 4 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Breezy conditions may create areas of blowing and drifting snow, especially over mountain passes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park
